author: Deleted User
content:
Hi :)
I wonder is there is anything specific for the genesis slot in terms of block proposals - it should be treated just like any other slot, correct? And there will be a validator who will have to propose on that slot?
Perhaps this has been discussed before somewhere in some channel...?

author: djrtwo
content: there are no proposals at genesis slot but attestations happen

author: djrtwo
content: the genesis slot has a pre-defined genesis block
